name: Microstory_01
description:
(Picture by Karl Kopinski for The Godfather: Corleone's Empire board game.)

Twine Micro Stories is a series of twine games made to explore different aspects of narrative game design.

Each episode is focused on one specific aspect of video games storytelling. They are mean to be played in a few minutes and, most importantly, twice. Finishing them will unlock the commentaries that elaborate on what was offered.
